quote: If you want to do this part-time, get out of the business.
why_clipworthy: It's a strong statement that emphasizes the dedication required in real estate.
suggested_hook: Thinking of doing real estate part-time? Think again.

quote: Walk through doors, go to open houses, preview properties. Opportunities come from being active.
why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable strategy for agents during slow periods.
suggested_hook: Feeling stuck in real estate? Here's how to create your own opportunities.
